blocks.text: global_variables_initalizer initalizes variables randomly so a dependent variable may get initialized before an independent variable, and hence is errorneous , eg the following is incorrect

x = tf.Variable(35, name='x')
y = tf.Variable(x + 5, name='y')

model = tf.global_variables_initializer() 

with tf.Session() as session:
    session.run(model)
    print(session.run(y))
